duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage incidents, service requests, and problems for multiple applications.
Facilitate outages with bridge calls, pull in required resources/skillsets, and communicate updates.
Create and maintain a knowledge base of standard operating procedures and application documentation.
Troubleshoot application alerts from monitoring tools.
Create change requests, implementation plans, and rollback plans.
Monitor metrics to identify areas of improvement within application support.

education_certification.credential: College diploma or university degree in the field of computer science and/or 4 years equivalent work experience.
Minimum 2 years of experience in application support.
